text:
@realDonaldTrump Where was this issue on the priority sheet?

Any word on Russians paying the Taliban to kill American soldiers? Are you wearing a mask yet to protect other Americans from the COVID19? How is the corruption within the DOJ going? Are you going golfing in Mara Lago this weekend?
